prop.name: gameItem
prop.desc: An item is an object within the game world that can be collected by a player or, occasionally, a non-player character.

prop.name: seasons
prop.desc: A season in a media series.

prop.name: gamePlatform
prop.desc: The electronic systems used to play video games.

prop.name: actor
prop.desc: An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc., or in an event. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

prop.name: numberOfEpisodes
prop.desc: The number of episodes in this season or series.

prop.name: trailer
prop.desc: The trailer of a movie or tv/radio series, season, episode, etc.

prop.name: season
prop.desc: A season in a media series.

prop.name: episodes
prop.desc: An episode of a TV/radio series or season.

prop.name: cheatCode
prop.desc: Cheat codes to the game.

prop.name: characterAttribute
prop.desc: A piece of data that represents a particular aspect of a fictional character (skill, power, character points, advantage, disadvantage).

prop.name: gameLocation
prop.desc: Real or fictional location of the game (or part of game).

prop.name: musicBy
prop.desc: The composer of the soundtrack.

prop.name: containsSeason
prop.desc: A season that is part of the media series.

prop.name: directors
prop.desc: A director of e.g. tv, radio, movie, video games etc. content. Directors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

prop.name: playMode
prop.desc: Indicates whether this game is multi-player, co-op or single-player.  The game can be marked as multi-player, co-op and single-player at the same time.

prop.name: numberOfSeasons
prop.desc: The number of seasons in this series.

prop.name: director
prop.desc: A director of e.g. tv, radio, movie, video gaming etc. content, or of an event. Directors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

prop.name: productionCompany
prop.desc: The production company or studio responsible for the item e.g. series, video game, episode etc.

prop.name: quest
prop.desc: The task that a player-controlled character, or group of characters may complete in order to gain a reward.

prop.name: numberOfPlayers
prop.desc: Indicate how many people can play this game (minimum, maximum, or range).

prop.name: actors
prop.desc: An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

prop.name: episode
prop.desc: An episode of a tv, radio or game media within a series or season.

CreativeWorkSeries.name: endDate
CreativeWorkSeries.desc: The end date and time of the item (in ISO 8601 date format).

CreativeWorkSeries.name: issn
CreativeWorkSeries.desc: The International Standard Serial Number (ISSN) that identifies this serial publication. You can repeat this property to identify different formats of, or the linking ISSN (ISSN-L) for, this serial publication.

CreativeWorkSeries.name: startDate
CreativeWorkSeries.desc: The start date and time of the item (in ISO 8601 date format).
